医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
MMR 疫苗减少了幼儿的抗生素使用：北欧研究揭示了更广泛的益处研究表明，两岁以下儿童接种三剂 DTaP 后接种 MMR 疫苗可显着减少抗生素治疗的需求，凸显了潜在的非特异性保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/MMR-vaccine-slashes-antibiotic-use-in-toddlers-Nordic-study-shines-light-on-broader-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/MMR-vaccine-slashes-antibiotic-use-in-toddlers-Nordic-study-shines-light-on-broader-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b929b660-109b-43c7-9456-c01e009619cc Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:55:00 -0400 MMR vaccine slashes antibiotic use in toddlers: Nordic study shines light on broader benefits
研究揭示了吸烟成瘾中基因的相互作用第一次吸一口尼古丁，您的 DNA 与社会和环境因素一起，在塑造接下来发生的事情中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-sheds-light-on-the-interplay-of-genes-in-smoking-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-sheds-light-on-the-interplay-of-genes-in-smoking-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05fb97b8-7665-48e6-9b43-ee42eaba0aaf Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Study sheds light on the interplay of genes in smoking addiction
关注NSCLC治疗中的致癌驱动突变和耐药机制肺癌是全球癌症相关死亡的主要原因。对非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 驱动突变的了解不断加深，为晚期患者提供了更多针对生物标志物的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Focusing-on-oncogenic-driver-mutations-and-resistance-mechanisms-in-the-treatment-of-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Focusing-on-oncogenic-driver-mutations-and-resistance-mechanisms-in-the-treatment-of-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a32796ec-000d-4a85-91b5-11d3339c128a Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:47:22 -0400 Focusing on oncogenic driver mutations and resistance mechanisms in the treatment of NSCLC
持续锻炼可以改善睡眠并减少失眠发表于《2019 年》的一项为期 10 年的国际研究表明，长期坚持每周锻炼 2-3 次可以降低目前的失眠风险，并且能够按照建议的每晚闭眼 6-9 小时的时间进行锻炼。开放获取期刊 BMJ Open。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Consistent-exercise-improves-sleep-and-reduces-insomnia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Consistent-exercise-improves-sleep-and-reduces-insomnia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58a8cc19-70ea-42c6-9b60-18bd66495bdc Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:35:17 -0400 Consistent exercise improves sleep and reduces insomnia
基于人工智能的分析发现两种植物提取物具有作为 GLP-1 激动剂减肥药的潜力欧洲肥胖大会 (ECO 2024)（5 月 12 日至 15 日，威尼斯）将在一项基于 AI（人工智能）的研究中鉴定出两种具有作为 GLP-1 激动剂减肥药潜力的植物化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/AI-based-analysis-uncovers-two-plant-extracts-with-potial-as-GLP-1-agonist-weight-loss-pills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/AI-based-analysis-uncovers-two-plant-extracts-with-potial-as-GLP-1-agonist-weight-loss-pills.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc3d9c67-4b80-4293-b441-23945d6c7a44 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:30:11 -0400 AI-based analysis uncovers two plant extracts with potential as GLP-1 agonist weight loss pills
单剂量登革热疫苗显示出不同的结果：保护取决于先前的接触研究调查了菲律宾儿童单剂 CYD-TDV 疫苗对登革热病毒的保护作用，结果表明，虽然该疫苗不能保护既往没有感染过或感染过一次登革热的儿童，但它可以显着降低既往感染过两次或两次以上登革热病毒的儿童的感染风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Single-dengue-vaccine-dose-shows-mixed-results-Protection-hinges-on-prior-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Single-dengue-vaccine-dose-shows-mixed-results-Protection-hinges-on-prior-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28fe6a4c-8e68-4b7d-bf8d-d68d9700f411 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:25:00 -0400 Single dengue vaccine dose shows mixed results: Protection hinges on prior exposure
家用化学品危害大脑髓磷脂形成细胞研究通过对小鼠和人类干细胞衍生模型采用创新的高通量筛选方法，揭示了环境化学物质（特别是有机磷酸酯阻燃剂和季铵化合物）如何对少突胶质细胞发育产生负面影响，使其与潜在的神经发育风险（例如多动症和自闭症）有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Household-chemicals-endanger-brains-myelin-forming-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Household-chemicals-endanger-brains-myelin-forming-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f8f62ec-2053-4f0e-9c1d-33e57d78b4ec Tue, 26 Mar 2024 23:02:00 -0400 Household chemicals endanger brain's myelin-forming cells
先进的测序揭示了与干眼症相关的眼部微生物组差异研究人员使用先进的测序技术来确定健康眼睛患者体内的微生物组合与干眼患者体内的微生物组合有何不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Advanced-sequencing-reveals-eye-microbiome-variances-linked-to-dry-eye.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Advanced-sequencing-reveals-eye-microbiome-variances-linked-to-dry-eye.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2d9df59-75db-4977-a9b5-53536134a4d4 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 22:56:20 -0400 Advanced sequencing reveals eye microbiome variances linked to dry eye
延迟早产儿腹股沟疝修补手术可降低风险休斯敦大学健康中心的研究人员表示，将早产儿腹股沟疝气修复手术推迟到新生儿重症监护室出院后似乎可以降低发生严重不良事件的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Delaying-surgical-inguinal-hernia-repair-in-preterm-infants-reduces-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Delaying-surgical-inguinal-hernia-repair-in-preterm-infants-reduces-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99ecdd23-7bf2-405b-baf1-8b20e5b6505b Tue, 26 Mar 2024 22:51:22 -0400 Delaying surgical inguinal hernia repair in preterm infants reduces risks
多组学方法比传统方法提高了疾病预测的准确性研究强调，通过将多基因风险评分（PRS）和肠道微生物组评分与传统风险因素相结合，可以显着增强对心脏病、糖尿病、阿尔茨海默病和前列腺癌等常见疾病的预测，展示了多组学方法在个性化医疗中的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Multiomic-approach-boosts-disease-prediction-accuracy-beyond-traditional-methods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Multiomic-approach-boosts-disease-prediction-accuracy-beyond-traditional-methods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=980f9155-7bce-4b7f-85f0-9cce1bd945f1 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 22:41:00 -0400 Multiomic approach boosts disease prediction accuracy beyond traditional methods
